name: Mahjong Puzzle by SZY
description:
This is an addictive puzzle game using Mahjong tiles.

[Features]

* In each puzzle game, you must use all given 12 patterns to fit into the up half of the board.

* 12 gray Mahjong tiles pre-occupy some spaces and you can not move them.

* Optional number of hints varies from 0 to 4 with 0 being very challenging.

* Even with the least hard game of 4 hints, you are required to think seriously.

* To achieve higher scores, you must reduce the number of hints to challenge yourself with more difficult game.

* Your skills are evaluated not only by a single game, but by 5-continuous-victory games as well.

* You can have a try for a pattern and touch it to change its color so that you can remember that this pattern is uncertain.



[Notes]

* Although 19 different patterns can be made of 4 pieces, this game uses only 18 patterns and the square pattern is not used.

*Each game uses 12 patterns.

*Unfinished game will be automatically saved.
